Packages that use com.alexkasko.springjdbc.blob
com.alexkasko.springjdbc.blob   
 

Classes in com.alexkasko.springjdbc.blob used by com.alexkasko.springjdbc.blob
AbstractJdbcBlobTool
          Basic implementation of Postgres-flavoured BLOB operations for other databases using standard JDBC API.
BlobException
          Exception for BLOB related errors
BlobTool
          Front-end for BLOB operations.
DetachedBlob
          BLOB data, detached from database.
InputStreamBlob
          Interface for "readable" BLOBs
OutputStreamBlob
          Interface for PostgreSQL-like BLOBs, can be used as OutputStream on data write.
